Title: An estimated 90% of adults in the US have fillings — here's why we can't just regrow our teeth (www.businessinsider.com)
Content: Mammals, on the other hand, developed more specific diets. Like grazers who only eat grass and hunters who rip flesh from their kills. As a result, mammals evolved different shaped teeth for different purposes. And it's this difference, that could also explain why most mammals can't regrow more teeth.


Now, let's say you could regrow your molars multiple times, for example. It's important that the top and bottoms sets match up. Otherwise, they can't grind up food as efficiently. It sounds good in principle, but with each new set, there's a risk that the regrown teeth won't line up. Content: As humans, we have 2 sets of teeth. We develop a set of baby teeth from as early as a tiny embryo inside the womb. Baby teeth help shape the way our jaw grows, chew food properly and help us learn to speak our first words.


Most children will start with 20 primary baby teeth, 10 on the top and 10 on the bottom. These teeth are eventually replaced with 32 permanent adult teeth, 16 on each upper and lower jaw, as we grow older and our jaws start to develop.

Title: Automatic Transmission Fluid - an overview (www.sciencedirect.com)
Content: Automatic transmissions (wet clutches) require hydrodynamic clutches, torque converters and wet brakes. Due to the function-related fluid losses, these always require low-viscosity, mildly additivated gear lubrication with a high oxidation stability. In order to reduce fuel consumption ATFs must have lower viscosities while at the same time maintaining protection for gears and bearings despite the lower lubricant film thickness.

prompt:

Title: Why Do Ads Follow Me Around the Internet? (askleo.com)
Content: It works like this:


1. You visit a shopping site, or a site that offers some kind of service. This site may or may not show ads, but they do include content from an advertising network.
2. The advertising network places a cookie on your computer. That cookie contains information to the effect of, “This computer was looking at X,” where X is the product or service offered by the site you’re visiting.
3. Eventually, you move on to another website — a site that also displays ads, and coincidentally uses the same advertising network as the site we started at.
4. That advertising network is given its own cookie back — the one that says, “This computer was looking at X” — and as a result, elects to show you ads for X.

Title: Longboard VS Skateboard – Pros, Cons, and Differences – BoardCoast (www.boardcoast.com)
Content: Longboards are typically much longer and wider than skateboards. They also have different types of wheels. Longboards have large, soft wheels whereas skateboards have small, hard wheels. Longboards are also much more flexible and tend to be easier to ride for beginners.

The soft wheels on a longboard are great for riding, and rolling over cracks and small debris at high speeds, but they are bouncier than hard wheels. Typically you don’t want to use soft wheels when performing tricks because the board can possibly bounce back up after the wheels hit the pavement. It makes it much more difficult to land tricks and remain stable.

The trucks of skateboards and longboards are also different. Skateboards have small trucks, that stay underneath the board but longboards have wide trucks with a different design. Wide trucks provide more stability which is needed at high speeds.
---

Title: Longboard vs Skateboard – Similarities and Differences | SkateboardersHQ (www.skateboardershq.com)
Content: Longboards are wider and longer than skateboards, are more flexible and easier to ride for beginners. Longboards have large soft wheels and skateboard have small hard wheels.

Big soft wheels are great for riding but are more bouncy compared to hard wheels. This means if you do an ollie (jump) for example, the board is more likely to bounce back up. This makes landing a trick unstable and more chances of landing primo (both feet on the side of the deck).

Skateboards have smaller trucks, longboards have wider trucks and have a different design. Wider trucks provide more stability which you need at higher speeds. Smaller trucks make a board more agile which is needed for ollies and flips.

Content: Longboards are typically much longer and wider than skateboards. They also have different types of wheels. Longboards have large, soft wheels whereas skateboards have small, hard wheels. Longboards are also much more flexible and tend to be easier to ride for beginners.

The soft wheels on a longboard are great for riding, and rolling over cracks and small debris at high speeds, but they are bouncier than hard wheels. Typically you don’t want to use soft wheels when performing tricks because the board can possibly bounce back up after the wheels hit the pavement. It makes it much more difficult to land tricks and remain stable.

The trucks of skateboards and longboards are also different. Skateboards have small trucks, that stay underneath the board but longboards have wide trucks with a different design. Wide trucks provide more stability which is needed at high speeds.

Sheria ya Kichwa IX ya 1972 ilipoamuru fursa sawa za michezo shuleni, haikutaja lazima baseball; shule ziliruhusiwa kutoa “mchezo sawia,” na zikachagua softball, hivyo kisheria ziliweza kuwakataa wasichana waliotaka baseball bora mradi timu ya softball ipo [2].

Wakati Little League iliporuhusu msichana wa miaka 12 kucheza 1972, uongozi wake ulitishia kufuta ushirika wa timu hiyo na badala yake ukaanzisha ligi mahususi ya softball, hatua iliyoimarisha zaidi mwanzo wa wasichana kwenye softball kuliko baseball [1].

Matokeo yake, katika ngazi za shule ya upili na vyuo, softball ndilo mchezo rasmi wa wanawake, hivyo wasichana wanaotamani ufadhili wa masomo au uchezaji wa kisasa hukabiliwa na shinikizo “kuhama kutoka baseball hadi softball” ili kuepuka upweke na kupata nafasi za udhamini [3].
Mfumo huu wa kimfumo na kihistoria ndicho husababisha wanawake wengi Marekani leo kucheza softball badala ya baseball.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Je! Kwa nini wanawake wa Amerika hawawezi kucheza baseball? (www.thedailybeast.com)
Content: Walakini, kama maendeleo mengi kwa wanawake wa Merika wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, baseball baadaye ilikoma kuwa chaguo la kitaalam. "Mnamo miaka ya 1950, tuliwafukuza wanawake kwa kila kitu," Ring alisema. "Tuna muongo huu mbaya kwa wanawake katika historia ya Amerika. Ni muongo wakati wanawake wanarudishwa nyumbani."


Na harakati za ukombozi wa wanawake na Kichwa cha IX, michezo ilirudiwa tena miaka ya 1970 kwa wanawake, lakini baseball haikufanya. "Baseball haikuwahi kugeuza kona na kufungua milango kwa wanawake," Ring alisema.


Kwa kweli, kuna ushahidi kulikuwa na juhudi iliyokubaliwa kuweka wasichana nje ya baseball. Mnamo 1972, shirika la kitaifa la Ligi ndogo lilitishia kubatilisha makubaliano ya timu huko Hoboken, New Jersey, kwa sababu walimruhusu Maria Pepe wa miaka 12 kucheza. Shirika la Kitaifa la Wanawake lilichukua kesi hiyo na kushtaki kwa mafanikio ili kuruhusu Pepe na wasichana wengine kuweza kujaribu. Kujibu shinikizo, Ligi ndogo iliunda mpira wa laini wa ligi.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Why not let girls play baseball instead of softball? (www.carolinacoastonline.com)
Content: When Title IX, the 1972 law that required equal funding to both male and female sports teams, finally appeared, women were given fair ground on nearly every sport.


Baseball was not on that list, though. Instead, the law dictated that the school must provide an equivalent sport, and in that case, it was softball. Thus, schools were within their right to deny girls who were interested in baseball as long as a softball team was provided.


Since then, women all over the country, and now the world, have fought for the chance to play on their school’s baseball team. Some have succeeded, and most have failed, but none have made a serious impact.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Will Women Play Major League Baseball? (And Not Just on TV) (www.nytimes.com)
Content: Women’s baseball is not a high school sport in the United States, although it is in other nations, like Canada and Japan. In this country, girls are directed to softball, which is a women’s sport at the high school and collegiate level, Dr. Ring says.


“If a girl here wants to play baseball, she almost has to play with the boys and the pressure to switch from baseball to softball can be overwhelming,” she says. “People will tell her, you’re missing out on college scholarships” and may also suggest that she is hurting both her body and possibly male opponents’ egos if she sticks with hardball.


Playing elite baseball also can be profoundly lonely for a woman, says Ms. Hudek, the Bossier Parish college player and one of the most successful young female pitchers of recent years.
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Why Can’t American Women Play Baseball? (www.thedailybeast.com)
Content: However, like so many advancements for U.S. women during World War II, baseball later ceased to be a professional option. “In the 1950s, we shoved women out of everything,” Ring said. “We have this unfortunate decade for women in American history. It’s a decade when women are sent back into the home.”


With the women’s liberation movement and Title IX, sports reemerged in the 1970s for women, but baseball did not. “Baseball never turned a corner and opened the doors to women,” said Ring.


Indeed, there’s evidence there was a concerted effort to keep girls out of baseball. In 1972, the national Little League organization threatened to revoke the charter of a team in Hoboken, New Jersey, because they allowed 12-year-old Maria Pepe to play. The National Organization for Women took on the case and successfully sued to allow for Pepe and other girls to be able to try out. In response to the pressure, Little League created Little League Softball.

Content: Baseball ya wanawake sio mchezo wa shule ya upili nchini Merika, ingawa ni katika mataifa mengine, kama Canada na Japan. Katika nchi hii, wasichana wameelekezwa kwa mpira wa miguu, ambayo ni mchezo wa wanawake katika shule ya upili na kiwango cha pamoja, Dk. Ring anasema.


"Ikiwa msichana hapa anataka kucheza baseball, karibu lazima kucheza na wavulana na shinikizo la kubadili kutoka baseball hadi laini inaweza kuwa kubwa," anasema. "Watu watamwambia, unakosa masomo ya vyuo vikuu" na pia wanaweza kupendekeza kwamba anaumiza mwili wake wote na uwezekano wa wapinzani wa kiume ikiwa atashikamana na mpira wa miguu.


Kucheza baseball wasomi pia inaweza kuwa mpweke sana kwa mwanamke, anasema Bi Hudek, mchezaji wa chuo kikuu cha Bossier na mmoja wa vijana waliofanikiwa zaidi wa kike wa miaka ya hivi karibuni.

question_src: Je! Kwa nini 'mchanga wa haraka' hufanya uweke na mchanga huenda wapi?
all_claims: “Mchanga wa haraka” ni tabaka la chembe ndogo (k.m.

mchanga au silt) lililosheheni maji kutoka chanzo cha chini ya ardhi, hivyo hutenda kama tope lenye maji mengi kuliko mshikamano; unapokanyaga, shinikizo husababisha maji kupenya kati ya chembe, kupunguza msuguano na kuyaachia yateleze, ndipo mwili huanza “kuzama” kwa sababu mchanga unakuwa kama kioevu [1].

Unazama tu hadi uzito wako uwe sawa na uzito wa mchanganyiko wa mchanga-maji uliouhama; kwa kuwa wiani wa mchanga wa haraka ni takriban 2 g/ml dhidi ya 1 g/ml ya mwili wa binadamu, kawaida mtu hufikia mstari wa kiuno kisha kusimama kuelea, isipokuwa akijaribu kupambana [2].

Chembe zilizosukumwa kando ya miguu hujiweka tena juu yako, na kadiri mwendo unavyopungua maji huruhusu mchanga kutulia na kuunda “kitanda” kipya cha nusu-ngumu kinachokukaza, ndiyo maana kujitoa ni kugumu—nafaka nzito zaidi hukushikilia mahali pamoja badala ya “kutoweka” [3].
Hivyo, mchanga hauendi mbali; hushamiri kama tope lenye mtiririko wakati wa msukumo kisha hurudi kuwa safu ngumu karibu na mwathiriwa unapoacha kusogea.

Chembe zilizosukumwa kando ya miguu hujiweka tena juu yako, na kadiri mwendo unavyopungua maji huruhusu mchanga kutulia na kuunda “kitanda” kipya cha nusu-ngumu kinachokukaza, ndiyo maana kujitoa ni kugumu—nafaka nzito zaidi hukushikilia mahali pamoja badala ya “kutoweka” [3].
prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Je! Haraka itakuua kweli? (thescienceExplorer.com)
Content: Kwa kweli, tafiti zimegundua kuwa haiwezekani kuingizwa kabisa kwa haraka kwa sababu wanadamu hawana mnene kuliko wepesi na mtu angezama tu kwenye kifua chao kabla ya kuanza kuelea.


Lakini kinachoweza kufanya Quicksand kuwa mbaya ni uwezo wake wa kuvuta na kushikilia wahasiriwa wasio na matarajio.


Quicksand hufanyika wakati sediment nzuri kama vile mchanga, mchanga, hariri, au mchanga mwingine wa mchanga hujaa maji, kawaida kutoka kwa chanzo cha chini ya ardhi. Mara nyingi mitego hii hupatikana karibu na pembezoni au makali ya vyanzo vya maji asilia. Mara nyingi mchanga juu unaweza kuonekana kuwa thabiti, lakini kwa shinikizo iliyoongezwa ya miguu, mchanga utachanganyika na maji chini yake kutengeneza sludge nene.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Quicksand. The science behind the properties of Quicksand. (www.zigya.com)
Content: Objects in the quicksand sink to the level at which the weight of the object is equal to the weight of the displaced soil/water mix and the submerged obje ct floats due to its buoyancy. The density of quicksand is 2 g/ml which is about twice that of a human body (1 g/ml), Thus, a human should sink only half way in (till the waist line), in case he/she does not struggle. Even objects with a higher density than quicksand will float on it—until they move.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Quicksand. The science behind the properties of Quicksand. (www.zigya.com)
Content: The sand particles get displaced and the animal/human sinks in it. Objects in liquefied sand sink to the level at which the weight of the object is equal to the weight of the displaced soil/water mix. Since Quicksand has a density twice than that of human, thus a person is usually trapped to their waist.


As the weight of the organism becomes equal to that of the displaced quicksand, the liquefaction process stops and the sand eventually forms a semi-solid bed again. The denser sand grains hold the animal tight, preventing it from escaping.
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Will Quicksand Really Kill You? (thescienceexplorer.com)
Content: In fact, studies have found it is impossible to be completely submerged in quicksand because humans are less dense than quicksand and a person would only sink to their chest before they begin to float.


But what can make quicksand deadly is its ability to trap and hold unsuspecting victims.


Quicksand occurs when fine sediment such as clay, sand, silt, or other grainy soil becomes saturated with water, typically from a subterranean source. Often these traps are found near the periphery or edge of natural water sources. Often the sand on top may appear solid, but with the added pressure of a footstep, the sand will mix with the water beneath it forming a thick sludge.
---

Content: Vitu kwenye wepesi kuzama kwa kiwango ambacho uzito wa kitu ni sawa na uzani wa mchanganyiko wa mchanga/maji na maji ya OBJE yaliyowekwa kwa sababu ya buoyancy yake. Uzani wa haraka ni 2 g/ml ambayo ni karibu mara mbili ya mwili wa mwanadamu (1 g/ml), kwa hivyo, mwanadamu anapaswa kuzama nusu tu katika (hadi mstari wa kiuno), ikiwa yeye hajapambana. Hata vitu vilivyo na wiani wa juu kuliko haraka vitakavyoelea juu yake - hadi watakapohama.

Document ID: 3
Title: Quicksand. The science behind the properties of Quicksand. (www.zigya.com)
Content: The sand particles get displaced and the animal/human sinks in it. Objects in liquefied sand sink to the level at which the weight of the object is equal to the weight of the displaced soil/water mix. Since Quicksand has a density twice than that of human, thus a person is usually trapped to their waist.


As the weight of the organism becomes equal to that of the displaced quicksand, the liquefaction process stops and the sand eventually forms a semi-solid bed again. The denser sand grains hold the animal tight, preventing it from escaping.
---

question_src: Je! Walifanyaje misa ya Phillae ya Comet ilitua?
all_claims: Ili kupata thamani ya wingi wa kometi ambamo kitoro cha Philae kiliwasili, wahandisi wa ESA kwanza walikusanya picha za dijiti zenye azimio kubwa kutoka kamera mbalimbali za Rosetta na kuziunganisha katika ramani ya eneo, kisha wakaunda mfano wa kijiometri wa “mesh” ulio na paneli za pembetatu unaozunguka uso wa kometi; mfano huu uliwapa ujazo sahihi wa mwili huo mbinguni [1].

Hatua iliyofuata ilikuwa kupima “kuvuta kwa mvuto” (gravitational tug) wa kometi hiyo kwa kufuatilia mabadiliko madogo katika mwendo wa Rosetta na Philae zinapokaribia na kuzunguka kometi, kisha kutumia usambazaji huo wa mvuto kwenye mfano wa umbo uliokwishapimwa; kwa kulinganisha nguvu ya mvuto iliyopimwa na ujazo uliohesabiwa, timu iliweza kuamua msongamano (density) na hatimaye kukokotoa wingi kamili wa kometi kwa kutumia uhusiano ρ = m/V [1].
Njia hii ya kuchanganya ramani ya uso-3D na vipimo vya mvuto ndiyo iliruhusu ESA kujua kadirio la wingi wa kometi kabla na baada ya kutua kwa Philae, bila kuhitaji kuchimba ndani ya mwili wa kometi.

Content: Ili kutua kwenye comet, ESA ilibidi ichunguze njia bora ya kuzunguka Rosetta kuzunguka. Rosetta lazima awe mbele ya comet kwa hali bora ya mwangaza kutoka jua. Changamoto sasa ni kujua kuvuta kwa mvuto wa comet. Sura ya piramidi inawaruhusu kupokea vyema na kuchambua data hiyo, mwishowe ikifikiria wiani na wingi wa comet.

Document ID: 2
Title:  (www.vanderbilt.edu)
Content: What is the mass of a comet?


Let's assume the comet is a sphere with a radius of 5 km. Then the volume of this comet is


> V = 4/3 pi R^3= 500 km^3= 5 x 10^17 cm^3


Assuming a density of 1 gm/cc, typical for water ice, then this comet would have a total mass of 5 x 10^17 gm = 5 x 10^14 kg.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: JimsAstronomy: Using Calculus to determine the mass of a comet (jdetrick.blogspot.com)
Content: - The comet was 2,000 meters long. We can use Calculus to calculate the volume of the comet by measuring the radius at each point along its length then summing up (integrating) an infinite number of areas of circles with each radius over the entire length.
---

question_src: Je! Hali ya hewa au dhoruba zinaweza kudhibitiwa au mwanadamu? Ikiwa ni hivyo, kwa kiwango gani na vipi?
all_claims: Ndiyo, binadamu anaweza kuathiri hali ya hewa lakini kwa kiwango kidogo na kwa muda mfupi; mbinu kuu ni “cloud seeding,” ambapo chembe za iodini ya fedha au chumvi hupuliziwa ndani ya mawingu ili kuchochea mvua, kupunguza ukubwa wa mawe ya mvua au kufukuza ukungu karibu na viwanja vya ndege [1].
Hata hivyo, utafiti wa zaidi ya miaka 30 umeonyesha matokeo yasiyotabirika, na sayansi haijathibitisha ufanisi wa uhakika wa mbinu hizi [1].

Uchunguzi Afrika Kusini na Mexico umebaini kuwa miche ya mawingu ya joto kwa chumvi inaweza kufanya kazi vizuri zaidi kuliko ile ya iodini ya fedha, lakini bado ni urekebishaji mdogo badala ya udhibiti kamili [1].
China imedai kuweza kuhakikisha siku fulani kuwa na mvua au jua, mfano wakati wa ufunguzi wa Olimpiki ya Beijing 2008, ingawa madai hayo hayajathibitishwa kwa upana [1].

Aidha, nyaraka za kijeshi zimetaja matumizi ya leza au miradi kama HAARP kuanzisha umeme bandia au kubadilisha ionosfera kama silaha za hali ya hewa, lakini uthibitisho wake unabaki wa kinadharia na wa siri [2].
Kwa jumla, hatuna uwezo wa kuongoza dhoruba kubwa kama vimbunga au kubadilisha mifumo ya hali ya hewa duniani; tunachoweza ni kurekebisha matukio madogo ndani ya eneo dogo kwa muda mfupi.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Je! Tunaweza kudhibiti hali ya hewa? (Sayansi.HowStuffworks.com)
Content: Mwishowe, wanasayansi walikuwa wamepata njia ya kudhibiti hali ya hewa - angalau katika maabara. Kwa miaka 30 ijayo, watafiti na wafanyabiashara kote ulimwenguni walianza kutumia kanuni zilizotengenezwa na Langmuir, Schaefer na Vonnegut kwa miche ya wingu ya ulimwengu wa kweli. Waliruka ndege ndani ya mawingu, wakitoa mawingu yao wenyewe ya iodini ya fedha wakati wanaenda, au kurusha ganda la sanaa lililojazwa na iodini ya fedha ndani ya mawingu. Katika hali nyingine, modifiers hizi za hali ya hewa zilikuwa zinajaribu kutoa mvua katika maeneo yenye ukame, kupunguza uharibifu wa mvua ya mawe kwa kuzuia mawe ya mvua ya mawe kutoka kwa kubwa, au kutawanya benki za ukungu kuzunguka viwanja vya ndege. Wamiliki wengi wa teknolojia hii mpya walifanya madai mazuri juu ya huduma zao za miche ya wingu. Kwa bahati mbaya, sayansi ngumu haiwezi kamwe kudai madai hayo. Ikiwa kuna chochote, majaribio magumu yalionekana kupendekeza kwamba miche ya wingu haifanyi kazi au, mbaya zaidi, haikufanya kazi hata kidogo.

Bado, ushahidi wa kutosha wa kutatanisha umekusanyika kwa miaka ili kuweka shauku katika muundo wa hali ya hewa hai. Kwa mfano, utafiti uliofanywa nchini Afrika Kusini na Mexico umeonyesha kuwa miche ya mvua ya joto na chembe za chumvi - kile kinachojulikana kama miche ya mseto - ni bora zaidi kuliko miche ya mvua ya mvua na iodini ya fedha. Na wanasayansi wa China wanaamini kuwa wamepata miche ya wingu kwa kiwango kwamba wanaweza kuhakikisha kuwa siku fulani itakuwa ya mvua au ya jua, kama inavyosema sherehe ya ufunguzi wa Olimpiki ya Majira ya 2008 huko Beijing, kama nakala hii inayohusiana.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: New World War: Weather Warfare (www.newworldwar.org)
Content: A precision lightning strike with synthetic lightning is also possible. The 2005 book, Weapons Grade: How Modern Warfare Gave Birth to Our High-Tech World, mentioned that artificial lightning had been accomplished using lasers. One reportedly had a range of about 200 meters, but could possibly be extended to about 2 miles. The 1997 Weather Wars: Pentagon Plans Weather as a Weapon article by the New York Times noted that the US Air Force was considering using such lasers for lightning attacks.

The US Air Force itself referenced using controlled lightning strikes to attack its targets. The Tofflers suggested that lasers can even be used to cut holes in the ozone layer above the land of an adversary.

HAARP

According to this information, weather modification is possible using electromagnetic waves. In the US and other countries, large weapons platforms to accomplish this appear to have been created.2

One such weapon is known as the High Frequency Active Auroral Research Project (HAARP). In their book Angels Don’t Play This HAARP: Advances in Tesla Technology, Jeane Manning and Dr. Nick Begich refer to it as one of the most powerful multi-purpose weapons developed by the US military.

Hata hivyo, utafiti wa zaidi ya miaka 30 umeonyesha matokeo yasiyotabirika, na sayansi haijathibitisha ufanisi wa uhakika wa mbinu hizi [1].

Uchunguzi Afrika Kusini na Mexico umebaini kuwa miche ya mawingu ya joto kwa chumvi inaweza kufanya kazi vizuri zaidi kuliko ile ya iodini ya fedha, lakini bado ni urekebishaji mdogo badala ya udhibiti kamili [1].
China imedai kuweza kuhakikisha siku fulani kuwa na mvua au jua, mfano wakati wa ufunguzi wa Olimpiki ya Beijing 2008, ingawa madai hayo hayajathibitishwa kwa upana [1].

Aidha, nyaraka za kijeshi zimetaja matumizi ya leza au miradi kama HAARP kuanzisha umeme bandia au kubadilisha ionosfera kama silaha za hali ya hewa, lakini uthibitisho wake unabaki wa kinadharia na wa siri [2].

Wamiliki wengi wa teknolojia hii mpya walifanya madai mazuri juu ya huduma zao za miche ya wingu. Kwa bahati mbaya, sayansi ngumu haiwezi kamwe kudai madai hayo. Ikiwa kuna chochote, majaribio magumu yalionekana kupendekeza kwamba miche ya wingu haifanyi kazi au, mbaya zaidi, haikufanya kazi hata kidogo.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Can we control the weather? (science.howstuffworks.com)
Content: Finally, scientists had found a way to control the weather -- at least in the lab. For the next 30 years, researchers and entrepreneurs across the world began applying the principles developed by Langmuir, Schaefer and Vonnegut to real-world cloud seeding. They flew airplanes into the clouds, releasing their own clouds of silver iodide as they went, or fired artillery shells filled with silver iodide into clouds. In some cases, these weather modifiers were trying to produce rain in drought-afflicted areas, mitigate hail damage by preventing hailstones from growing so large, or disperse fog banks around airports. Many proprietors of this new technology made audacious claims about their cloud seeding services. Unfortunately, hard science could never substantiate the claims. If anything, rigorous experimentation seemed to suggest that cloud seeding barely worked or, worse, didn't work at all.

Still, enough tantalizing evidence has accumulated over the years to keep interest in weather modification alive. For example, research conducted in South Africa and Mexico has shown that seeding warm rain clouds with salt particles -- what is known as hygroscopic seeding -- is more effective than seeding cold rain clouds with silver iodide. And Chinese scientists believe they have mastered cloud seeding to such a degree that they can guarantee a certain day will be rainy or sunny, like say the opening ceremony of the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, as this related article describes.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Vita vipya vya Ulimwengu: Vita vya hali ya hewa (www.newworldwar.org)
Content: Mgomo wa umeme wa usahihi na umeme wa syntetisk pia inawezekana. Kitabu cha 2005, Silaha Daraja: Jinsi Vita vya kisasa vilizaa ulimwengu wetu wa hali ya juu, ilisema kwamba umeme wa bandia ulikuwa umekamilika kwa kutumia lasers. Mtu ameripotiwa alikuwa na anuwai ya mita 200, lakini inaweza kupanuliwa hadi maili 2. Vita vya hali ya hewa ya 1997: Pentagon inapanga hali ya hewa kama nakala ya silaha na New York Times ilibaini kuwa Jeshi la anga la Amerika lilikuwa likifikiria kutumia lasers kama hizo kwa shambulio la umeme.

Jeshi la Anga la Amerika yenyewe lilirejelewa kwa kutumia migomo ya umeme iliyodhibitiwa kushambulia malengo yake. Tofflers walipendekeza kwamba lasers inaweza kutumika hata kukata shimo kwenye safu ya ozoni juu ya ardhi ya adui.

Haarp

Kulingana na habari hii, muundo wa hali ya hewa unawezekana kwa kutumia mawimbi ya umeme. Katika Amerika na nchi zingine, majukwaa makubwa ya silaha kukamilisha hii yanaonekana kuwa yameundwa.2

Silaha moja kama hiyo inajulikana kama Mradi wa Utafiti wa Auroral Active Active (HAARP). Document ID: 3
Title: How does a lake freeze? (whyfiles.org)
Content: As winter sets in, lakes lose energy to the atmosphere, and water near the surface cools, becomes more dense, and sinks. Warmer, less dense water under the surface will rise to replace this surface water. When the entire lake reaches 40 F, the surface water cools further, dropping below 40 F. Because this water is now less dense than the surrounding water, it will stay on the top and continue to cool.


Once the surface water falls to 32 F, it freezes. The freezing then spreads downward into the lake and the ice thickens. Unless the lake is very shallow, you will find liquid water below the ice. This deeper water is about 40 F

claim: Kasi ya saa (clock speed) huonyesha idadi ya mizunguko ambayo msingi mmoja wa CPU hufanya kwa sekunde; mfano, CPU ya 3.2 GHz hufanya takribani mizunguko bilioni 3.2 kila sekunde
question_src: Kasi ya saa na/vs cores kwenye kompyuta
all_claims: Kasi ya saa (clock speed) huonyesha idadi ya mizunguko ambayo msingi mmoja wa CPU hufanya kwa sekunde; mfano, CPU ya 3.2 GHz hufanya takribani mizunguko bilioni 3.2 kila sekunde [3].
Kasi hii inatokana na kuzidisha kizio cha msingi (BCLK) na kikorokoro cha CPU, hivyo kikorokoro cha 46 × 100 MHz huzaa 4.6 GHz [1].
Kwa kazi zinazotegemea nyuzi chache, kama michezo mingi ya kisasa, kiwango cha juu cha GHz huleta faida dhahiri [2].
Hata hivyo, cores ni idadi ya vitengo vya usindikaji huru; kwa mfano, prosesa mbili-msingi 3.0 GHz ina vitengo viwili vinavyoendesha kila kimoja kwa 3.0 GHz [4].

Programu zenye usomaji anuwai (multithreading) zinaweza kugawanya kazi kati ya cores nyingi na hivyo kuongeza kasi ya jumla [5], na teknolojia kama Hyper-Threading inaweza kuongeza nyuzi za kimantiki ndani ya msingi mmoja ili kushiriki mzigo [6].

Kwa hivyo, ikiwa programu zako zinatumia nyuzi chache, chagua CPU yenye GHz kubwa; ikiwa zinapimia kwa nyuzi nyingi (u-hariri video, uigaji, uendeshaji seva), kipaumbele kiwe idadi kubwa ya cores, huku ukikumbuka kuwa uwiano bora mara nyingi ni muunganiko wa cores nyingi na kasi ya saa ya kutosha.

question_src: Je! Matukio katika ndoto zangu yanaambatana vipi na matukio ambayo yanatokea katika maisha halisi?
all_claims: Uhusiano kati ya matukio unayoyaona ndotoni na yanayojitokeza baadaye katika maisha halisi mara nyingi unaweza kuelezwa na “sheria ya wastani” na upendeleo wa kumbukumbu kuliko uwezo wa kinabii wa ndoto zenyewe; watu huota mara kwa mara ajali za gari, kwa hiyo ni jambo la kawaida kwamba siku moja mtu ataota ajali kisha apate ajali halisi, lakini hili hutokea zaidi kwa sababu tukio hilo lilikuwa tayari na uwezekano wa kutokea badala ya kuashiria utabiri [1].

Wakati madai ya kwamba ndoto “zilitabiri” yaliyotokea yanaweza kuwa matokeo ya bahati nasibu, kukumbuka tu ndoto zinazolingana na uhalisia (na kusahau zile zisizolingana) huchochea kuamini kuwa kuna uhusiano wa moja kwa moja, ingawa mara nyingi ushahidi thabiti wa kisayansi haupo [1].

Content: Katika historia yote, watu wameamini kuwa ndoto za kinabii zinaweza kutupatia matukio ya siku zijazo. Je! Kuna sababu yoyote ya kuamini ndoto kama hizo zinawezekana?

Kwa mfano, watu wanaota mara kwa mara ajali za gari, kwa hivyo wakati fulani, mtu ataota ajali ya gari usiku kabla ya kuingia kwenye ajali ya gari. Huo sio unabii, hiyo ni sheria ya wastani. Madai ya watu hufanya juu ya ndoto za baadaye za kusema zina uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa mawazo, uwongo, au kushindwa kwa hoja za sababu.


Hiyo inaweza kuwa nafasi salama kabisa ya kuchukua. Sio msimamo wa kisayansi zaidi, hata hivyo, kwa sababu sio msingi wa ushahidi, ni mashaka tu. Ushuhuda halisi katika kuunga mkono ndoto za kutarajia sio kufukuzwa kwa urahisi na unastahili umakini mkubwa kuliko kawaida.

question_src: Kwa nini mfumo wa reli ya Merika ni mbaya sana?
all_claims: Mfumo wa reli wa Merika ni dhaifu kwa sababu kadhaa: kwanza, nchi haina mtandao wa kweli wa reli ya kasi kubwa; sehemu pekee inayokaribia viwango hivyo ni Acela, ambayo hukimbia maili 34 tu kwa 150 mph kwenye njia yake ya jumla ya maili 457 na hivyo kufikia wastani wa 65 mph kati ya New York na Boston, kiwango kinachoshindwa na mifumo ya Asia na Ulaya [1].

Pili, miradi mipya kama reli ya kasi ya California imekumbwa na sintofahamu—kuongezwa kwa vituo visivyo lazima, ujenzi wa haraka usio na mpango na maamuzi mabaya ya kifedha—na hata ilipoteza ruzuku ya shirikisho ya dola milioni 929 kufuatia mvutano wa kisiasa, jambo linaloonyesha jinsi pendulum ya kisiasa inavyoweza kuua miradi kabla haijakamilika [2].

Hatimaye, utamaduni wa “gari kwanza”: Marekani ina kiwango cha juu cha umiliki wa magari, hivyo raia na wanasiasa husita kutoza kodi kubwa kwa magari au mafuta ili kufadhili reli ya kasi kubwa, tofauti na mataifa mengine yanayofaulu katika sekta hiyo [3].

prompt:

Title: Amerika ni mbaya katika kujenga reli ya kasi kubwa-ndio sababu (www.cnbc.com)
Content: Uchina ina mtandao wa reli ya haraka na kubwa zaidi ulimwenguni-zaidi ya maili 19,000, idadi kubwa ambayo ilijengwa katika muongo mmoja uliopita.


Treni za risasi za Japan zinaweza kufikia karibu maili 200 kwa saa na tarehe hadi miaka ya 1960. Wamehamia zaidi ya watu bilioni 9 bila majeruhi mmoja wa abiria.


Ufaransa ilianza huduma ya treni ya TGV ya kasi kubwa mnamo 1981 na Ulaya yote ilifuata haraka.


Lakini Merika haina treni za kweli za kasi kubwa, kando na sehemu za mstari wa Amtrak wa Acela katika Ukanda wa Kaskazini mashariki. Acela inaweza kufikia 150 mph kwa maili 34 tu ya urefu wa maili 457. Kasi yake ya wastani kati ya New York na Boston ni karibu 65 mph.


Mfumo wa reli ya kasi kubwa ya California unajengwa, lakini ikiwa itawahi kukamilika kama ilivyokusudiwa haina uhakika.
---

Title: The real reason the United States has no high-speed rail network (www.grunge.com)
Content: High-speed rail isn't just achievable: It already exists. However, as with anything else in the U.S. today, the biggest obstacle in the way of American high-speed rail is politics. Speeding up the Acela Express, for example, would require billions in federal funding, according to Fortune. Good luck with that in today's polarized environment. Meanwhile, the political squabbles that have faced California's bullet train ambitions are now legendary, and not in a good way. While the concept of connecting the Golden State's biggest cities via bullet train is brilliant, Vox says the planning has been horrendous, between the addition of pointless and expensive stops, rushed construction, and bad financial decisions. The political battles got even nastier in 2019, when the Trump administration pulled $929 million in federal grants for California's high-speed rail, according to MSN.

Content: The U.S. automobile obsession is an obstacle for high-speed rail dreams, according to Forbes, because cultural mores impact funding decisions. You think a tax like that would ever fly in the U.S.? Not in this lifetime.

Pili, miradi mipya kama reli ya kasi ya California imekumbwa na sintofahamu—kuongezwa kwa vituo visivyo lazima, ujenzi wa haraka usio na mpango na maamuzi mabaya ya kifedha—na hata ilipoteza ruzuku ya shirikisho ya dola milioni 929 kufuatia mvutano wa kisiasa, jambo linaloonyesha jinsi pendulum ya kisiasa inavyoweza kuua miradi kabla haijakamilika [2].

Hatimaye, utamaduni wa “gari kwanza”: Marekani ina kiwango cha juu cha umiliki wa magari, hivyo raia na wanasiasa husita kutoza kodi kubwa kwa magari au mafuta ili kufadhili reli ya kasi kubwa, tofauti na mataifa mengine yanayofaulu katika sekta hiyo [3].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: The US is terrible at building high-speed rail — here's why (www.cnbc.com)
Content: China has the world's fastest and largest high-speed rail network — more than 19,000 miles, the vast majority of which was built in the past decade.


Japan's bullet trains can reach nearly 200 miles per hour and date to the 1960s. They have moved more than 9 billion people without a single passenger casualty.


France began service of the high-speed TGV train in 1981 and the rest of Europe quickly followed.


But the U.S. has no true high-speed trains, aside from sections of Amtrak's Acela line in the Northeast Corridor. The Acela can reach 150 mph for only 34 miles of its 457-mile span. Its average speed between New York and Boston is about 65 mph.


California's high-speed rail system is under construction, but whether it will ever get completed as intended is uncertain.
---

Title: Sababu halisi ya Merika haina mtandao wa reli ya kasi kubwa (www.grunge.com)
Content: Reli yenye kasi kubwa sio tu inayoweza kufikiwa: tayari ipo. Walakini, kama ilivyo kwa kitu kingine chochote huko Merika leo, kikwazo kikubwa katika njia ya reli ya kasi ya Amerika ni siasa. Kuharakisha Acela Express, kwa mfano, kunahitaji mabilioni katika ufadhili wa serikali, kulingana na Bahati. Bahati nzuri na hiyo katika mazingira ya leo ya polar. Wakati huo huo, milio ya kisiasa ambayo imekabiliwa na matamanio ya gari la California sasa ni hadithi, na sio kwa njia nzuri. Wakati wazo la kuunganisha miji mikubwa ya Jimbo la Dhahabu kupitia treni ya risasi ni nzuri, Vox anasema mipango imekuwa ya kutisha, kati ya nyongeza ya vituo visivyo na maana na ghali, ujenzi wa haraka, na maamuzi mabaya ya kifedha. Vita vya kisiasa vilikuwa vikali zaidi mnamo 2019, wakati utawala wa Trump ulipotoa dola milioni 929 katika ruzuku ya shirikisho kwa reli ya kasi kubwa ya California, kulingana na MSN.

Title: The real reason the United States has no high-speed rail network (www.grunge.com)

Content: High-speed rail isn't just achievable: It already exists. However, as with anything else in the U.S. today, the biggest obstacle in the way of American high-speed rail is politics. While the concept of connecting the Golden State's biggest cities via bullet train is brilliant, Vox says the planning has been horrendous, between the addition of pointless and expensive stops, rushed construction, and bad financial decisions. The political battles got even nastier in 2019, when the Trump administration pulled $929 million in federal grants for California's high-speed rail, according to MSN.

question_src: Kwa nini HTTPS/SSL inahitaji cheti cha kufanya usambazaji salama, wakati SSH haifanyi hivyo?
all_claims: HTTPS/SSL hutegemea cheti cha X.509 kilichotiwa saini na Mamlaka ya Cheti ili kivinjari kipate njia ya kiotomatiki ya kuthibitisha kuwa “seva” inayoshikilia jina la kikoa kweli ni kampuni halali, hivyo wateja wanaweza kuamini na kuingiza taarifa nyeti kama namba za kadi ya mkopo bila kuhofu wizi wa data, kwani cheti hicho ndicho kiungo cha kuaminiana katika mazingira ya intaneti ya umma yasiyohusisha utambulisho wa awali kati ya pande zinazowasiliana [1].
SSL bila cheti isingeweza kutoa uthibitishaji huu, kwa kuwa itifaki inategemea vyeti ili kujenga mlolongo wa uaminifu (chain of trust) kabla ya kusimbwa kwa taarifa kuanza [2].

Kinyume chake, SSH hutumiwa zaidi kati ya mashine mbili ambazo waendeshaji wake tayari wanajulikana; uthibitishaji hufanywa kwa jozi ya ufunguo wa kibinafsi/umma au kwa jina la mtumiaji/nenosiri, na mteja huhifadhi “host key” ya seva mara ya kwanza, hivyo haihitaji cheti kilichosainiwa na CA ili kuanzisha mkondo salama [2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: HTTPS: What is a SSL Certificate and Why Do You Need One? | Redwood Valley Technical Solutions Web Design (rvtechsolutions.com)
Content: [Image: SSL Certificate Secure Browsing]Both HTTPS and SSL are in place to ensure your website is trustworthy and responsible. Through approving your webpage, your audience knows that they are more or less protected when browsing or buying from your page.

If you’re not familiar with HTTPS and SSL, you’ll want to brush up on what they mean and what they include. Let’s begin by taking a look at what HTTPS and SSL stand for.

HTTPS stands for Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure. HTTPS is the secure version of HTTP, meaning that the communication between your visitor and your website is secure and encrypted.

There are a number of benefits to having an HTTPS website over a standard HTTP, especially if your visitor is frequently entering detailed or sensitive information when they visit your site. If your customer needs to enter credit card information or other personal information, you’ll want to have an HTTPS page.

Having an HTTPS shows your visitor that you’re a valid company, so they don’t need to be worried about entering credit card information to make a purchase online. The information they do enter will become encrypted, so it cannot be stolen or intercepted.

Your HTTPS website can establish a stronger level of trust with your customer. When they know that their information is protected, they’ll be more likely to purchase from your company over your competition.

## What is SSL?

SSL, which stands for Secure Socket Layer, works with your HTTPS website to protect your customer’s information and privacy. SSL, which may also be called TLS, or Transport Layer Security, is the encryption communication that your HTTPS website will use to encrypt the information a customer or client puts into your website.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: SSH vs SSL | Tofauti 8 za juu na kulinganisha unapaswa kujifunza (www.educba.com)
Content: Wote SSH na SSL ni itifaki za ufunguo wa umma wa maandishi ambayo huunda salama, ya siri ya data na unganisho kwenye mtandao. Wacha tujadili tofauti kuu kuu:

 1. Kawaida, SSH hutumia bandari 22, wakati SSL hutumia bandari 443. 2. SSH hutumia mchakato wa uthibitishaji wa jina la mtumiaji/nenosiri kuanzisha unganisho salama, wakati SSL haizingatii. 3. SSH ni msingi wa utaftaji wa mtandao, wakati SSL inategemea vyeti. 4. SSL inatumika kwa kusambaza salama habari muhimu kama kadi za mkopo na benki. Wakati SSH inatumika kwa kutekeleza kwa usalama amri kwenye mtandao. 5. SSL inatumika kwa mawasiliano ya usisitizo kati ya kivinjari na seva. Kwa upande mwingine, SSH hutumiwa kwa usisitizo wa mawasiliano kati ya kompyuta mbili kwenye mtandao. 6. Katika SSL, mawasiliano yamethibitishwa kupitia jozi ya kibinafsi/ya ufunguo wa umma. Wakati katika SSH, mawasiliano yamethibitishwa kupitia jozi ya kibinafsi/ya ufunguo wa umma au jina la mtumiaji/jozi ya nywila. 7. Kitaalam, SSH ni ya kupata mitandao ya kompyuta, wakati SSL ni ya kupata uhamishaji wa data mkondoni. 8. SSL kwa ujumla (isipokuwa isipokuwa) hutumia vyeti vya dijiti vya X.509 kwa michakato ya uthibitishaji wa seva na mteja, wakati SSH haifanyi. 9. Tofauti nyingine kubwa ni kwamba SSH ina utendaji zaidi wa kujengwa kuliko SSL. Inasaidia katika kuwezesha watumiaji kuingia kwenye seva na kutekeleza amri kwa mbali, wakati SSL haina utendaji huu. Ili kufikia utendaji huu, unahitaji kuifunga na itifaki nyingine kama HTTP, FTP.

all_claims: Tovuti za rununu huweka kitufe cha “bonyeza hapa kuendelea kusoma” ili kutatua changamoto ya nafasi ndogo kwenye skrini ndogo: kifupi cha makala kinachoonekana kwanza huruhusu msomaji kuchambua vichwa vya habari haraka bila kusukumwa chini na maandishi marefu, hivyo kuwezesha wabuni “kushinikiza” maudhui mengi zaidi kwenye sehemu ndogo ya ukurasa wa nyumbani [1].
Mbinu hii pia inarahisisha kwa wasimamizi kufuatilia ni machapisho yapi yanayopata mibofyo mingi, kwa sababu kila kubofya kiungo hicho ni kipimo cha moja kwa moja cha umaarufu wa makala husika [1].
Kwa tovuti zinazotegemea matangazo, kuongeza idadi ya mibofyo mara mbili au tatu kupitia kitufe hiki huongeza maoni ya kurasa na kuvutia zaidi watangazaji, hivyo kuongeza mapato [1].

Zaidi ya hayo, Google imeeleza kuwa kuficha maandishi nyuma ya “Soma Zaidi” haina athari hasi kwenye SEO, hivyo wamiliki wa tovuti hawatumii hatari ya kushuka kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji wanapoboresha uzoefu wa rununu kwa nyongeza hii [2].
Hatimaye, kiungo hicho hutoa utendaji rahisi wa kubadilisha kati ya kuonyesha na kuficha yaliyomo, kulinda upangaji safi na kasi ya upakiaji kwenye simu [3].
claims_retained: Tovuti za rununu huweka kitufe cha “bonyeza hapa kuendelea kusoma” ili kutatua changamoto ya nafasi ndogo kwenye skrini ndogo: kifupi cha makala kinachoonekana kwanza huruhusu msomaji kuchambua vichwa vya habari haraka bila kusukumwa chini na maandishi marefu, hivyo kuwezesha wabuni “kushinikiza” maudhui mengi zaidi kwenye sehemu ndogo ya ukurasa wa nyumbani [1].
Kwa tovuti zinazotegemea matangazo, kuongeza idadi ya mibofyo mara mbili au tatu kupitia kitufe hiki huongeza maoni ya kurasa na kuvutia zaidi watangazaji, hivyo kuongeza mapato [1].

Zaidi ya hayo, Google imeeleza kuwa kuficha maandishi nyuma ya “Soma Zaidi” haina athari hasi kwenye SEO, hivyo wamiliki wa tovuti hawatumii hatari ya kushuka kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji wanapoboresha uzoefu wa rununu kwa nyongeza hii [2].
prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Kubuni Viungo vya "Soma Zaidi" na "Endelea Kusoma" - Jarida la Smashing (www.smashingmagazine.com)
Content: Kabla ya kuwasilisha onyesho, wacha tuelewe kwa nini viungo vya "soma zaidi" ni muhimu sana. Ni muhimu kwa sababu kadhaa, muhimu zaidi kwa sababu wanaruhusu wabuni kushinikiza yaliyomo kwenye ukurasa wa nyumbani. Kwa kushinikiza yaliyomo, unastahili yaliyomo zaidi katika nafasi ndogo. Hii inamaanisha kuwa wasomaji wanaweza kuchambua vichwa vya habari haraka na kwamba unaweza kutoshea habari zaidi juu ya zizi.


Zaidi baada ya kuruka! Endelea kusoma hapa chini ↓


Pia, viungo vya "Soma Zaidi" huruhusu wasimamizi wa wavuti kufuata kwa urahisi zaidi yaliyomo maarufu. Wabunifu ambao huweka nakala nzima kwenye ukurasa wa nyumbani wanaweza kufanya kuwa ngumu kwa wasimamizi wa wavuti kufuata nakala maarufu na kuelewa kile watumiaji wanataka kuona.


Sababu ya tatu na labda ya vitendo zaidi ya kuwa na viungo "zaidi" kwenye wavuti ni pesa. Wavuti ambazo zinafanya mapato ya trafiki zinaelewa kuwa wasomaji wao wanapo bonyeza viungo, ndivyo wanavyoweza kutazama na bonyeza kwenye matangazo. Viungo vya "Soma Zaidi" vinaweza kuongeza mara mbili au hata mara tatu idadi ya maoni ya ukurasa ambayo tovuti hupokea, na kuifanya kuvutia zaidi kwa watangazaji.

Document ID: 2
Title: How “Hiding” Content Behind a Read More Button Impacts SEO (www.dealer.com)
Content: At this year’s SMX Advanced in Seattle I asked Google’s Gary Illyes if “hiding” content behind a Read More button affects websites’ SEO.


His answer wasn’t surprising considering Google’s stance on user experience. This practice, which essentially directs users to click a button/link that says Read More or Read On to view the full content, does have an effect on sites’ SEO, including auto retailers using Dealer.com Websites. Specifically, Google does not index content hidden behind these buttons on desktop sites.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Read More Button - How to Add, Best Practices & SEO Impacts - SEOptimer (www.seoptimer.com)
Content: The ‘read more ‘ button comes in handy for every webmaster. The button is versatile and has many uses, for example, it can be used to truncate content so that only a part is displayed. It is also used to toggle between showing and hiding content, for example when a site hides content and wants you to subscribe in order to read the rest.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Designing “Read More” And “Continue Reading” Links — Smashing Magazine (www.smashingmagazine.com)
Content: Before we present the showcase, let’s understand why “Read more” links are so important. They are important for several reasons, most importantly because they allow designers to compress content on the home page. By compressing content, you fit more content in less space. This means that readers can scan headlines more quickly and that you can fit more information above the fold.


More after jump! Continue reading below ↓


Also, “Read more” links allow website administrators to more easily track the most popular content. Designers who put entire articles on the home page may make it difficult for website administrators to track the most popular articles and understand what users want to see.


The third and probably most practical reason for having “Read more” links on a website is money. Websites that monetize traffic understand that the more their readers click on links, the more likely they will look at and click on advertisements. “Read more” links can double or even triple the number of page views a website receives, making it more attractive to advertisers.
---

Title: Jinsi "kujificha" yaliyomo nyuma ya kitufe cha Soma Zaidi Inaathiri SEO (www.dealer.com)
Content: Katika SMX ya mwaka huu huko Seattle niliuliza Gary Illyes ya Google ikiwa "kujificha" yaliyomo nyuma ya kitufe cha kusoma zaidi huathiri tovuti za SEO.


Jibu lake haishangazi kuzingatia msimamo wa Google juu ya uzoefu wa watumiaji. Kitendo hiki, ambacho kimsingi kinaelekeza watumiaji kubonyeza kitufe/kiunga ambacho kinasema soma zaidi au soma ili kuona yaliyomo kamili, haina athari kwenye tovuti za SEO, pamoja na wauzaji wa magari wanaotumia Wavuti ya Wauzaji.com. Hasa, Google haionyeshi yaliyofichika nyuma ya vifungo hivi kwenye tovuti za desktop.

claim: Chakula kikiteketezwa hupikwa katika joto la juu sana, hali inayosababisha sukari na asidi amino kwenye vyakula vya wanga kama viazi kuunda kemikali iitwayo acrylamide kupitia mmenyuko wa Maillard
question_src: Kwa nini kula chakula cha kuteketezwa ni mbaya kwako?
all_claims: Chakula kikiteketezwa hupikwa katika joto la juu sana, hali inayosababisha sukari na asidi amino kwenye vyakula vya wanga kama viazi kuunda kemikali iitwayo acrylamide kupitia mmenyuko wa Maillard [1].

Acrylamide imesababisha saratani kwa wanyama katika majaribio ya dozi kubwa na imetambuliwa na JECFA kuwa hatari inayowezekana kwa afya ya binadamu, hivyo kuwepo kwake kwenye chakula kunaweza kuongeza hatari ya saratani [2].

Kwa upande wa nyama, uchomaji mkali huzaa kemikali zenye sumu kama polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) na heterocyclic amines (HCAs) zinazoibuka kutokana na mafuta yanayowaka na mchanganyiko wa asidi amino na sukari [3].
HCAs hutokea zaidi nyama inapokuwa imeungua au kuwa nyeusi na zimeonyeshwa kusababisha saratani ya koloni, kongosho na tezi za mammary kwa panya baada ya kuamilishwa na kimeng’enya CYP1A2 [4].

Ingawa uhusiano wa moja kwa moja kwa binadamu bado haujathibitishwa kikamilifu, uwepo wa kemikali hizi zenye uwezo wa kubadilisha DNA umefanya wataalam kupendekeza kupunguza au kuondoa sehemu zilizochomeka na kupika kwa joto la wastani ili kupunguza hatari [2].
claims_retained: Chakula kikiteketezwa hupikwa katika joto la juu sana, hali inayosababisha sukari na asidi amino kwenye vyakula vya wanga kama viazi kuunda kemikali iitwayo acrylamide kupitia mmenyuko wa Maillard [1].

Acrylamide imesababisha saratani kwa wanyama katika majaribio ya dozi kubwa na imetambuliwa na JECFA kuwa hatari inayowezekana kwa afya ya binadamu, hivyo kuwepo kwake kwenye chakula kunaweza kuongeza hatari ya saratani [2].

Kwa upande wa nyama, uchomaji mkali huzaa kemikali zenye sumu kama polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) na heterocyclic amines (HCAs) zinazoibuka kutokana na mafuta yanayowaka na mchanganyiko wa asidi amino na sukari [3].
HCAs hutokea zaidi nyama inapokuwa imeungua au kuwa nyeusi na zimeonyeshwa kusababisha saratani ya koloni, kongosho na tezi za mammary kwa panya baada ya kuamilishwa na kimeng’enya CYP1A2 [4].
prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Acrylamide (www.niehs.nih.gov)
Content: Wakati vyakula fulani vinapikwa kwa joto la juu, sukari, kama sukari na fructose, inaweza kuguswa na asidi ya amino ya bure, avokado, kuunda acrylamide. Acrylamide huunda kama sehemu ya athari ya kemikali, inayojulikana kama majibu ya Maillard, ambayo inachangia harufu, ladha, na rangi ya vyakula vilivyopikwa. Acrylamide ni moja wapo ya mamia ya kemikali ambazo zinaweza kuunda wakati wa majibu ya Maillard.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Acrylamide Questions and Answers (www.fda.gov)
Content: Acrylamide caused cancer in animals in studies where animals were exposed to acrylamide at very high doses. In 2010, the Joint Food and Agriculture Organization/World Health Organization Expert Committee on Food Additives (JECFA) concluded that acrylamide is a human health concern, and suggested additional long-term studies. FDA experts participated in the evaluation and provided data from new research studies on acrylamide risk.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Does Burnt Food Cause Cancer? | Dana-Farber Cancer Institute (blog.dana-farber.org)
Content: When it comes to cooking meat, there are two different chemicals that occur when meat is cooked.


Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) are formed when fat and juices drip onto flames while frying, baking, or grilling meat. Heterocyclic amines (HCAs) are generated from reactions between molecules including amino acids and sugars.


[Image]


HCAs form when meat is exposed to high temperatures for a prolonged period of time; the longer the exposure, the more HCAs are formed. Microwaving meat briefly before cooking at a high temperature reduces the time the meat needs to be cooked, and therefore less HCAs are produced. Although some studies how burnt, fried, or barbecued meat is associated with higher risk of certain cancers in lab tests, the connection between charred food and increased cancer risk is not proven for certain.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Heterocyclic Amine - an overview (www.sciencedirect.com)
Content: HCAs form when amino acids and creatine react at high cooking temperatures and are formed in greater quantities when meats are overcooked or blackened. Seventeen different HCAs resulting from the cooking of muscle meats have been identified, which may pose human cancer risk.


HCAs develop a powerful carcinogenic potential when activated by cytochrome P450 1A2-mediated oxidation of the amino group, which is followed by acetylation or sulfation to form direct-acting reactive mutagens that attack key elements in DNA. When fed to rats, several of these HCAs can induce cancer of the mammary glands, colon, and pancreas.

Document ID: 3
Title: Does Burnt Food Cause Cancer? | Dana-Farber Cancer Institute (blog.dana-farber.org)
Content: When it comes to cooking meat, there are two different chemicals that occur when meat is cooked.


Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) are formed when fat and juices drip onto flames while frying, baking, or grilling meat. Heterocyclic amines (HCAs) are generated from reactions between molecules including amino acids and sugars.


[Image]


HCAs form when meat is exposed to high temperatures for a prolonged period of time; the longer the exposure, the more HCAs are formed. Microwaving meat briefly before cooking at a high temperature reduces the time the meat needs to be cooked, and therefore less HCAs are produced. Although some studies how burnt, fried, or barbecued meat is associated with higher risk of certain cancers in lab tests, the connection between charred food and increased cancer risk is not proven for certain.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Heterocyclic Amine - an overview (www.sciencedirect.com)
Content: HCAs form when amino acids and creatine react at high cooking temperatures and are formed in greater quantities when meats are overcooked or blackened. Seventeen different HCAs resulting from the cooking of muscle meats have been identified, which may pose human cancer risk.


HCAs develop a powerful carcinogenic potential when activated by cytochrome P450 1A2-mediated oxidation of the amino group, which is followed by acetylation or sulfation to form direct-acting reactive mutagens that attack key elements in DNA. When fed to rats, several of these HCAs can induce cancer of the mammary glands, colon, and pancreas.

question_src: Fafanua: (kwa Wamarekani): Uchaguzi wa Canada leo

Mtu anayeshinda kila riding huwa Mbunge, na chama kinachokusanya angalau viti 170 (nusu ya 338 +1) kinaunda serikali ya “wengi”; kikibaki na 169 au chini ya hapo kinakabiliwa na kuunda “serikali ya wachache” (minority) inayotegemea vyama vingine kupitisha sheria, hali inayofanana na Bunge la Marekani lisilo na udhibiti kamili wa chama kimoja [5].
Raia wote wa Kanada walio na umri wa miaka 18 au zaidi—hata wanaoishi nje ya nchi au walio gerezani—wanastahili kupiga kura, mfano ulio pana zaidi ya majimbo mengi ya Marekani [2].
Tofauti na Marekani, hakuna kura ya moja kwa moja ya rais; kiongozi wa chama chenye viti vingi zaidi kawaida huwa Waziri Mkuu, nafasi inayolingana na rais katika siasa za kila siku.

Mfumo huu huruhusu matokeo kubadilika kwa kasi, kwani kampeni hupangwa kitaifa lakini ushindi huamuliwa na matokeo ya eneo kwa eneo, kama kura 338 za “electoral college” zinazoendeshwa kwa kura ya uma moja kwa moja.

Content: As CNN and Motherboard have both explained, Ashley Madison is filing DMCA requests left and right, claiming that as they own copyright on the leaked materials, it is unlawful to redistribute or look at them. The claims are basically the same sort of takedown requests a film studio would file to get as-yet-unreleased movies pulled offline.


Whether they have a leg to stand on with those claims, however, is another story.


Motherboard delved into a lengthy explanation about what’s copyrightable and what’s not after Ashley Madison challenged a tweet from one of their staff writers. The TL;DR version of the law, which is important here, is that you can copyright original works, but not lists of facts.

Document ID: 4
Title: Why The Stolen Ashley Madison Data Is (Legally) Fair Game For The Internet (consumerist.com)
Content: Parts of the Ashley Madison data dump are copyrightable information. The source code for their websites, for example, is original work. Any advertising copy they published on their sites is, likewise, original to them. (And the source code for all of Avid Life’s sites has, indeed, been leaked, so they have some grounds there.)


But a big fat *.csv file full of data? That’s a set of facts, and as such, not a thing that is subject to being copyrighted.


Plenty of other information Ashley Madison has or had access to is also subject to copyright: anything the users write on their profiles, and the images they share. But the account-holders — all 30-odd million of them — are the ones who own that material. That’s been how leaked or stolen material has been successfully taken down before, for example when celebrities’ private photos were stolen from their phones in 2014. Google and other companies did comply with requests to take the images down, because those individuals owned their images and had grounds to request their removal.


You Can’t Put The Toothpaste Back In The Tube
As much as Ashley Madison and all its users wish it were not so, not only is the data probably not subject to copyright claims… but also even if it were, the media can still talk about it as much as they want.


The hackers absolutely broke laws when they stole information from inside Avid Life Media. But media who report on the information are not breaking laws. National security concerns aside (that’s covered by different law), the press can basically run with any information given to them innocently, even if the person giving it to them obtained it illegally.

Title: Chain letters (www.units.miamioh.edu)
Content: Why do people send chain letters? There are several known reasons to explain the chain letters' popularity. One reason is that it is a great source for obtaining new e-mail addresses. These addresses may lead to new contacts. This tactic can be considered an example of the "free-rider effect". The "free-rider effect" involves depending on others to collectively complete a task. Title: How do Guide Dogs work? (chicagolighthouse.org)
Content: Q: How do dog guides know where to go when traveling?


A: This is a team effort between the dog and its owner. The owner knows where and how he wants to get to a certain place, and he or she is responsible for telling the dog through verbal and hand signals. Directions include forward, left and right. When at a street crossing, the owner is responsible for judging when it is safe to cross based on the sound of the cars, and should then command the dog to begin crossing. Intelligent disobedience is when a dog refuses to cross the street because it is unsafe to do so, even when the owner has commanded it to go forward.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: How do Guide Dogs work? (chicagolighthouse.org)
Content: Q: How do dog guides know where to go when traveling?


A: This is a team effort between the dog and its owner. The owner knows where and how he wants to get to a certain place, and he or she is responsible for telling the dog through verbal and hand signals. Directions include forward, left and right. When at a street crossing, the owner is responsible for judging when it is safe to cross based on the sound of the cars, and should then command the dog to begin crossing. Intelligent disobedience is when a dog refuses to cross the street because it is unsafe to do so, even when the owner has commanded it to go forward.

Title: Je! Mbwa za mwongozo hufanyaje kazi? (chicagolighthouse.org)
Content: Swali: Je! Miongozo ya mbwa inajuaje kwenda wakati wa kusafiri?


J: Hii ni juhudi ya timu kati ya mbwa na mmiliki wake. Mmiliki anajua ni wapi na jinsi anataka kufika mahali fulani, na ana jukumu la kumwambia mbwa kupitia ishara za maneno na za mikono. Maagizo ni pamoja na mbele, kushoto na kulia. Wakati wa kuvuka barabarani, mmiliki ana jukumu la kuhukumu wakati ni salama kuvuka kulingana na sauti ya magari, na kisha anapaswa kuamuru mbwa kuanza kuvuka. Uasi wa busara ni wakati mbwa anakataa kuvuka barabara kwa sababu sio salama kufanya hivyo, hata wakati mmiliki ameamuru kwenda mbele.

Title: Good to know (www.blindenhundeschule.ch)
Content: Guide dogs don’t know where the visually impaired or blind person wants to go. The guide dog owner communicates via vocal cues which direction the dog needs to follow. Therefore, guide dog owners need to have a good sense of direction and to keep a map of their route in mind.

Content: ## Metal Gear Solid 3: Kula nyoka


Baada ya mwamba wa mwamba mwishoni mwa MGS2, kwa mtindo wa kweli wa Metal Gear, MGS3 haina uhusiano wowote nayo. Badala yake, MGS3 ni prequel. Wewe ni uchi wa Nyoka (tazama jinsi hiyo ilikuwa ngumu) ambaye alifundishwa chini ya bosi shujaa wa WW2 ambaye pia huwa na kasoro kwa Warusi. Unaingiza msingi wao, jifunze juu ya shirika la Illuminati-esque Wanafalsafa ambao wanaweza au hawatakufa, kukutana na kijana wa Revolver Ocelot, kujua bosi hakuwa na kasoro na yuko kwenye misheni tu, kumpiga kila mtu, kuokoa ulimwengu (lakini kwa siri), kumtaja bosi wa wakubwa wote: bosi mkubwa, na hatimaye kupata kufanya ngono na kifaranga moto. Ah na Ocelot hufanya kazi kwa CIA chini ya ishara ya simu Adamu ... hakuna kidokezo kwanini.

Foxhound waasi na inachukua kiwanja katika Alaska inayojulikana kama Kivuli Musa. Kwa mara nyingine tena Nyoka wa Mango lazima atoke kwa kustaafu kukabiliana na watu wabaya. Title: Can someone provide me with a summary of the Metal Gear Solid series? (gaming.stackexchange.com)
Content: ## Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater


After the cliff hanger at the end of MGS2, in true Metal Gear Solid fashion, MGS3 has nothing to do with it. Instead, MGS3 is a prequel. You're Naked Snake (see how hard was that) who was trained under The BOSS a hero of WW2 who also defects to the Russians. You infiltrate their base, learn about an Illuminati-esque organization The Philosophers who may or may not be dead, meet a young Revolver Ocelot, find out The BOSS didn't defect and is only on a mission, beat up everybody, save the world (but in secret), get dubbed the boss of all bosses: BIG BOSS, and finally get to have sex with a hot chick. Oh and Ocelot works for the CIA under the call sign ADAM... no clue why.

Content: ## Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater


After the cliff hanger at the end of MGS2, in true Metal Gear Solid fashion, MGS3 has nothing to do with it. Instead, MGS3 is a prequel. You infiltrate their base, learn about an Illuminati-esque organization The Philosophers who may or may not be dead, meet a young Revolver Ocelot, find out The BOSS didn't defect and is only on a mission, beat up everybody, save the world (but in secret), get dubbed the boss of all bosses: BIG BOSS, and finally get to have sex with a hot chick. Oh and Ocelot works for the CIA under the call sign ADAM... no clue why.

question_src: Je! Akili zetu zinakadiriaje kupita kwa wakati?
all_claims: Uchunguzi wa hivi karibuni unaonyesha kwamba ubongo hauutumii saa moja tu bali hutegemea angalau mifumo miwili: striatum inayoshirikiana na gamba la ubongo kama “saa” kuu ya ndani, na njia ya pili ambayo hufanya kazi sambamba au hata kushindana na ya kwanza katika kupima muda wa matukio [1].
Kwa majukumu yanayohitaji usahihi wa milisekunde, cerebellum pamoja na gamba la parietali na la msingi wa gari hupanga na kuratibu harakati zinazotegemea muda [3].

Aidha, gamba la kuona, la ukaguzi na la msingi wa gari huwashwa kulingana na kama kichocheo ni cha kuona, ni sauti au kinahusisha hatua, hasa vikikadiriwa vichocheo vifupi kuliko ms 200, jambo linaloonyesha kuwa ubongo huchagua mitandao maalum kulingana na muktadha [3].

Kiwango ambacho tunachakata taarifa—idadi ya “picha” za kiakili tunazorekodi—huchora hisia zetu za muda: kadri usindikaji unavyopungua kadiri tunavyozeeka, ndivyo wakati unavyoonekana kukimbia upesi zaidi [2].
Hatimaye, umakini na kumbukumbu huathiri mizani hii; wakati unaonekana kuruka tunapozama katika shughuli za kufurahisha na kujaa kumbukumbu, lakini kuchelewa tunapochoka au tunapokosa kuhusika [3].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Ubongo wako una saa 2 (www.scientificamerican.com)
Content: Wanasayansi wa Neuroscient wanaamini kuwa tunayo mifumo tofauti ya neural ya kushughulikia aina tofauti za wakati, kwa mfano, kudumisha wimbo wa circadian, kudhibiti wakati wa harakati nzuri za mwili, na kwa ufahamu wa ufahamu wa kifungu. Hadi hivi majuzi, wataalamu wengi wa akili waliamini kuwa aina hii ya mwisho ya usindikaji wa muda - aina ambayo inakuonya wakati umekaa juu ya kiamsha kinywa kwa muda mrefu sana - inasaidiwa na mfumo mmoja wa ubongo. Walakini, utafiti unaoibuka unaonyesha kuwa mfano wa saa moja ya neural inaweza kuwa rahisi sana. Utafiti mpya, uliochapishwa hivi karibuni katika Jarida la Neuroscience na Wanasayansi wa Neuros katika Chuo Kikuu cha California, Irvine, unaonyesha kwamba kwa kweli ubongo unaweza kuwa na njia ya pili ya kuhisi wakati uliopita. Nini zaidi, waandishi wanapendekeza kwamba saa hii ya pili ya ndani haifanyi kazi tu sambamba na saa yetu ya msingi ya neural, lakini inaweza kushindana nayo.


Utafiti wa zamani ulionyesha kuwa eneo la ubongo linaloitwa striatum liko moyoni mwa saa yetu ya ndani, ikifanya kazi na gamba la ubongo lililozunguka ili kuunganisha habari za kidunia.

Title: Physics explains why time passes faster as you age (qz.com)
Content: According to Bejan—who reviewed previous studies in a range of fields on time, vision, cognition, and mental processing to reach his conclusion—time as we experience it represents perceived changes in mental stimuli. It’s related to what we see. As physical mental-image processing time and the rapidity of images we take in changes, so does our perception of time. And in some sense, each of us has our own “mind time” unrelated to the passing of hours, days, and years on clocks and calendars, which is affected by the amount of rest we get and other factors.

Document ID: 3
Title: A stopwatch on the brain's perception of time (www.theguardian.com)
Content: It has also been shown that the cerebellum plays a key role in motor tasks requiring perception of implicit timing. Other parts of the brain may be involved in implicit-timing estimates: for example, the left parietal cortex, which manages intended movement, and the left premotor cortex, which plans and organises movement. Sometimes the right prefrontal cortex, usually involved in explicit-timing estimates, is activated for implicit estimates, for instance, when an event does not occur as soon as expected: a traffic light stays red for longer than foreseen. The brain updates its time forecasts, once again anticipating the interval.


In addition, "the regions of the brain involved differ depending on the context, particularly if the stimulus only lasts for a very short time, less than 200 milliseconds," says Coull. The visual cortex is activated when we estimate the duration of a visual stimulus. In the same way, the primary motor cortex comes into play when a timing estimate is associated with an action, whereas the auditory cortex has a part in estimating the length of a sound stimulus.


Above all, the brain's perception of time involves processes linked to memory and attention: witness the impression that time is passing more quickly when we are busy, or doing something amusing or exciting. Time flies even when we are in love. In contrast, a watched pot never boils. Minutes drag by when we are bored.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Your Brain Has 2 Clocks (www.scientificamerican.com)
Content: Neuroscientists believe that we have distinct neural systems for processing different types of time, for example, to maintain a circadian rhythm, to control the timing of fine body movements, and for conscious awareness of time passage. Until recently, most neuroscientists believed that this latter type of temporal processing – the kind that alerts you when you’ve lingered over breakfast for too long – is supported by a single brain system. However, emerging research indicates that the model of a single neural clock might be too simplistic. A new study, recently published in the Journal of Neuroscience by neuroscientists at the University of California, Irvine, reveals that the brain may in fact have a second method for sensing elapsed time. What’s more, the authors propose that this second internal clock not only works in parallel with our primary neural clock, but may even compete with it.


Past research suggested that a brain region called the striatum lies at the heart of our central inner clock, working with the brain’s surrounding cortex to integrate temporal information.

Title: Kuweka kwa mtazamo wa ubongo wa wakati (www.theerdian.com)
Content: Imeonyeshwa pia kuwa cerebellum ina jukumu muhimu katika kazi za gari zinazohitaji mtazamo wa wakati kamili. Sehemu zingine za ubongo zinaweza kuhusika katika makadirio ya wakati kamili: kwa mfano, gamba la kushoto la parietali, ambalo linasimamia harakati zilizokusudiwa, na cortex ya kushoto, ambayo inapanga na kupanga harakati. Wakati mwingine cortex ya haki ya utangulizi, ambayo kawaida huhusika katika makadirio ya wakati ulio wazi, huamilishwa kwa makadirio kamili, kwa mfano, wakati tukio halijatokea haraka iwezekanavyo: taa ya trafiki inakaa nyekundu kwa muda mrefu zaidi kuliko hapo awali. Ubongo husasisha utabiri wa wakati wake, kwa mara nyingine tena ukitarajia muda.


Kwa kuongezea, "mikoa ya ubongo inayohusika inatofautiana kulingana na muktadha, haswa ikiwa kichocheo kinadumu kwa muda mfupi sana, chini ya millisecond 200," anasema Coull. Cortex ya kuona imeamilishwa wakati tunakadiria muda wa kichocheo cha kuona. Vivyo hivyo, cortex ya msingi ya gari inakuja kucheza wakati makisio ya wakati yanahusishwa na hatua, wakati kortini ya ukaguzi ina sehemu katika kukadiria urefu wa kichocheo cha sauti.


Zaidi ya yote, mtazamo wa ubongo wa wakati unajumuisha michakato iliyounganishwa na kumbukumbu na umakini: kushuhudia maoni kwamba wakati unapita haraka wakati tunapokuwa na shughuli, au kufanya kitu cha kufurahisha au cha kufurahisha. Wakati nzi hata wakati tunapenda. Kwa kulinganisha, sufuria iliyoangaziwa kamwe huwaka. Dakika za kuvuta wakati tunapokuwa na kuchoka.

Until recently, most neuroscientists believed that this latter type of temporal processing – the kind that alerts you when you’ve lingered over breakfast for too long – is supported by a single brain system. However, emerging research indicates that the model of a single neural clock might be too simplistic. A new study, recently published in the Journal of Neuroscience by neuroscientists at the University of California, Irvine, reveals that the brain may in fact have a second method for sensing elapsed time. What’s more, the authors propose that this second internal clock not only works in parallel with our primary neural clock, but may even compete with it.


Past research suggested that a brain region called the striatum lies at the heart of our central inner clock, working with the brain’s surrounding cortex to integrate temporal information.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Physics explains why time passes faster as you age (qz.com)
Content: According to Bejan—who reviewed previous studies in a range of fields on time, vision, cognition, and mental processing to reach his conclusion—time as we experience it represents perceived changes in mental stimuli. It’s related to what we see. As physical mental-image processing time and the rapidity of images we take in changes, so does our perception of time. And in some sense, each of us has our own “mind time” unrelated to the passing of hours, days, and years on clocks and calendars, which is affected by the amount of rest we get and other factors.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Kuweka kwa mtazamo wa ubongo wa wakati (www.theerdian.com)
Content: Imeonyeshwa pia kuwa cerebellum ina jukumu muhimu katika kazi za gari zinazohitaji mtazamo wa wakati kamili. Sehemu zingine za ubongo zinaweza kuhusika katika makadirio ya wakati kamili: kwa mfano, gamba la kushoto la parietali, ambalo linasimamia harakati zilizokusudiwa, na cortex ya kushoto, ambayo inapanga na kupanga harakati. Wakati mwingine cortex ya haki ya utangulizi, ambayo kawaida huhusika katika makadirio ya wakati ulio wazi, huamilishwa kwa makadirio kamili, kwa mfano, wakati tukio halijatokea haraka iwezekanavyo: taa ya trafiki inakaa nyekundu kwa muda mrefu zaidi kuliko hapo awali. Ubongo husasisha utabiri wa wakati wake, kwa mara nyingine tena ukitarajia muda.


Kwa kuongezea, "mikoa ya ubongo inayohusika inatofautiana kulingana na muktadha, haswa ikiwa kichocheo kinadumu kwa muda mfupi sana, chini ya millisecond 200," anasema Coull. Cortex ya kuona imeamilishwa wakati tunakadiria muda wa kichocheo cha kuona. Vivyo hivyo, cortex ya msingi ya gari inakuja kucheza wakati makisio ya wakati yanahusishwa na hatua, wakati kortini ya ukaguzi ina sehemu katika kukadiria urefu wa kichocheo cha sauti.


Zaidi ya yote, mtazamo wa ubongo wa wakati unajumuisha michakato iliyounganishwa na kumbukumbu na umakini: kushuhudia maoni kwamba wakati unapita haraka wakati tunapokuwa na shughuli, au kufanya kitu cha kufurahisha au cha kufurahisha. Wakati nzi hata wakati tunapenda. Kwa kulinganisha, sufuria iliyoangaziwa kamwe huwaka. Dakika za kuvuta wakati tunapokuwa na kuchoka.
---

Kwa majukumu yanayohitaji usahihi wa milisekunde, cerebellum pamoja na gamba la parietali na la msingi wa gari hupanga na kuratibu harakati zinazotegemea muda [3].

prompt:

Title: USS Enterprise (CVN-65) (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: USS Enterprise (CVN-65), formerly CVA(N)-65, is a decommissioned[14] United States Navy aircraft carrier. She was the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier and the eighth United States naval vessel to bear the name. Like her predecessor of World War II fame, she is nicknamed "Big E". At 1,123 feet (342 m),[6][7] she is the longest naval vessel ever built. Her 93,284-long-ton (94,781 t)[5] displacement ranks her as the 12th-heaviest carrier, after the ten carriers of the Nimitz class and USS Gerald R. Ford. Enterprise had a crew of some 4,600 service members.[8]


The only ship of her class, Enterprise[15] was, at the time of inactivation, the third-oldest commissioned vessel in the United States Navy after the wooden-hulled USS Constitution and USS Pueblo.[16] She was inactivated on 1 December 2012,[17] and officially decommissioned on 3 February 2017,[18][19] after over 55 years of service.

question_src: Kwa nini watendaji na watendaji wa sauti wanapata pesa nyingi?
all_claims: Watendaji na watendaji wa sauti wanaolipwa sana hutengeneza dau kubwa kwa sababu umaarufu wao huwafanya “sanamu” na chapa hutaka kunufaika na mvuto wao kupitia mikataba ya kazi na idhini, hivyo hulipa pesa nyingi ili kufikia hadhira kubwa na kuongeza mauzo [1].
Bei yao inachochewa pia na ukweli kwamba idadi ya watu wanaoweza kutekeleza jukumu husika ni ndogo, kwa hivyo upungufu wa vipaji maalumu huongeza thamani yao sokoni [2].
Zaidi ya hapo, jukumu lao mara nyingi huzalisha mapato au sifa kubwa kwa mtayarishaji, hivyo kampuni ziko tayari kulipa zaidi ili kuhakikisha mafanikio ya filamu, tamasha au matangazo [2].

Waigizaji mastaa hutumia nguvu ya majina yao kujadiliana kwa kila mkataba na, kwa sababu bajeti za “blockbuster” hutabiri mapato makubwa, malipo yao huongezeka kadri uzalishaji unavyopanua bajeti [3].
Hata hivyo, muigizaji wa kawaida nchini Marekani alipata wastani wa dola 20.43 kwa saa mwaka 2019, ikionyesha kuwa malipo ya juu yanahusu wachache waliopo kileleni tu [4].

Title: Je! Ni tofauti gani kati ya saizi ya picha, saizi ya faili, na ubora wa picha? (www.sony.com)
Content: Saizi ya picha: Hii inawakilisha saizi ya mwili na azimio la picha iliyopimwa kwenye saizi. Kwa mfano, kamera 10 ya megapixel (mbunge) inaweza kutoa mipangilio ya kuchukua picha katika 10.2 mbunge (3872 x 2592), 5.6 mbunge (2896 x 1944), na mbunge 2.5 (1936 x 1296). Mpangilio wa saizi ya juu inamaanisha picha kubwa na saizi kubwa ya faili. Mpangilio wa saizi ya chini hufanya picha ndogo na saizi ndogo ya faili. Kulingana na kamera yako, kunaweza kuwa na saizi tofauti zinazopatikana.


Saizi ya Faili: Hii ni kiasi cha nafasi ambayo faili ya picha inachukua kwenye kadi yako ya kumbukumbu, au kumbukumbu ya ndani ikiwa kamera yako ina moja. Inapimwa katika megabytes. Saizi halisi ya faili inategemea saizi ya picha na mipangilio ya ubora wa picha iliyochaguliwa kwenye kamera.


Ubora wa picha: Hii inaamuru ni kiasi gani cha kushinikiza hutumiwa kurekodi habari ya faili. Kamera zingine za dijiti zina mpangilio mzuri na wa kawaida ambapo mpangilio mzuri hutumia compression kidogo kuliko mpangilio wa kawaida. Kwa hivyo, maelezo ya picha iliyochukuliwa na mpangilio mzuri ni nyembamba kuliko moja iliyochukuliwa na mpangilio wa kawaida. Sawa na mpangilio wa saizi ya picha iliyojadiliwa hapo juu, hii pia inaathiri saizi ya faili. Kwa kuwa mpangilio mzuri hutumia compression kidogo na rekodi ya undani zaidi, saizi ya faili itakuwa kubwa kuliko ile iliyorekodiwa na mpangilio wa kawaida.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: What is the difference between image size, file size, and image quality? (www.sony.com)
Content: Image size: This represents the physical size and resolution of an image measured in pixels. For example, A 10 megapixel (MP) camera may provide settings to take pictures in 10.2 MP (3872 x 2592), 5.6 MP (2896 x 1944), and 2.5 MP (1936 x 1296). A higher image size setting means a larger picture and bigger file size. A lower image size setting makes a smaller picture and smaller file size. Depending on your camera, there may be different sizes available.


File size: This is the amount of space that the image file takes up on your memory card, or internal memory if your camera has one. It is measured in megabytes. The actual file size depends on the image size and image quality settings selected on the camera.


Image quality: This dictates how much compression is used to record the file information. Some digital cameras have a Fine and Standard setting where the Fine setting uses less compression than the Standard setting. Therefore, the detail of a picture taken with the Fine setting is a sharper than one taken with the Standard setting. Similar to the image size setting discussed above, this also affects the file size. Since the Fine setting uses less compression and records more detail, the file size will be larger than one recorded with the standard setting.

question_src: Kwa nini sina msimamo kwenye baiskeli yangu wakati ni ya stationary lakini sio wakati inasonga?
all_claims: Sababu kuu ni kwamba baiskeli inayosimama ina sehemu mbili tu za mawasiliano na ardhi, hivyo msingi wake wa msaada ni mstari mwembamba badala ya pointi tatu au zaidi zinazohitajika kwa uthabiti; matokeo yake ni rahisi kuanguka ukiwa umesimama [2].
Zaidi ya hapo, magurudumu yaliyokoma hayana kasi ya mzunguko, kwa hiyo torque ndogo kutoka kwa mvuto au kutikisika kidogo inatosha kubadilisha mwelekeo wake na kuiangusha [2].
Unapoanza kusonga, magurudumu huzalisha kasi ya angular na mfumo wako na baiskeli hufuata kanuni ya uhifadhi wa kasi hiyo, hivyo inahitaji nguvu kubwa zaidi kuiangusha na hivyo huongeza uthabiti [2].

Wakati huohuo usukani na umbali unaoitwa ‘trail’ huruhusu gurudumu la mbele kujirekebisha kiotomatiki ili kituo cha mvuto kibaki juu ya mstari wa mawasiliano, jambo linaloifanya baiskeli ijisawazishe kadiri kasi inavyoongezeka [1].

Kwa hivyo, ukiwa umesimama unakosa msingi mpana na pia unakosa faida ya kasi ya magurudumu na marekebisho ya haraka ya usukani, ilhali ukiwa unaendesha, sababu hizo tatu—kasi ya mzunguko, uhifadhi wa mwendo na kujirekebisha kwa usukani—hufanya baiskeli iwe thabiti bila jitihada kubwa.
